Package com.github.xemiru.sponge.boxboy.button

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Button
    A clickable button in a Menu, represented by an ItemStack.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionButton
    A Button implementation that performs a single action when clicked.
    DummyButton
    A Button implementation that does absolutely nothing and thus should be used purely for aesthetical purposes.
    ScrollButton
    A Button implementation that switches between a varying number of states defined provided ActionButtons.
    SlotButton
    A Button implementation that pretends to be a normal inventory slot.
    ToggleButton
    A Button implementation that switches between two states defined by two provided ActionButtons.
